sentences.en: a crude drawing of a face
a crude estimate of the population available for work
sentences.cn: 对劳动力人口的粗略估计

sentences.en: A crude oil slick quickly spreads out over water.
sentences.cn: 原油泄露后的浮油很快在水面上扩散开来。

sentences.en: Don't be crude tonight, Bernard, it doesn't become you.
sentences.cn: 今晚别说荤话，伯纳德，说荤话可不好。

sentences.en: He was critical of the people, disparaging of their crude manners.
sentences.cn: 他对那些人很有看法，看不起他们粗俗的举止。

sentences.en: Honestly, Nev! Must you be quite so crude!
sentences.cn: 哎呀，内夫!你就非得如此粗俗吗！

sentences.en: Last night a cargo ship collided with a tanker carrying crude oil.
sentences.cn: 昨晚一艘货轮与一艘载着原油的油轮相撞.

sentences.en: Mendoza did much to change crude prize fighting into a sport.
sentences.cn: 为了把粗野的职业拳击变成一项运动,门杜萨作出了许多贡献.

sentences.en: Nev! Must you be quite so crude?
sentences.cn: 尼夫！你非得那么粗俗吗？

sentences.en: Oil majors need not fear being unable to sell their crude.
sentences.cn: 大型石油公司无需担心原油销售不出去。

sentences.en: The cottage wears a very crude appearance.
sentences.cn: 那幢农舍外观颇为简陋.

sentences.en: The pipeline supplies Jordan with 15 per cent of its crude oil.
sentences.cn: 该管道供给约旦15%的原油.

sentences.en: The purpose of oil refinery is to refine crude petroleum.
sentences.cn: 炼油厂的主要工作是提炼原油.

sentences.en: This is the virus in very crude simple diagrammatic form.
sentences.cn: 这是非常粗略简单的图式病毒形态。

sentences.en: To be crude and careless is an extremely bad style of work.
sentences.cn: 粗枝大叶是一种极坏的作风.

sentences.en: You've got such a crude mouth!

words.tran_cn: 粗糙地；天然地；粗鲁地；不成熟地
渣滓；脏家伙；搀和物；杂质
天然的状态；生硬；未成熟

phrases.tran_cn: n. 粗提物，	粗抽提物；粗提取液

trans.tran_cn: 粗略的，简陋的，粗俗的，天然的
trans.tran_en: crude oil, rubber etc is in its natural or raw condition before it is treated with chemicals
oil that is in its natural condition, as it comes out of an  oil well  , before it is made more pure or separated into different products
